DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this pilot study is to collect the necessary information for determining the appropriate sample size of a statistically powered trial comparing the performance of two different blood control peripheral intravenous catheters.
DOC.criteria: 18 years of age or older Willing and able to independently sign an English Informed Consent Have adequate veins for placement of IV catheters in both right and left upper extremities Currently taking anticoagulation medication Have a known bloodborne disease or bleeding tendency Have a known fear or adverse reaction to needles or blood Women who are pregnant or nursing
